message: Egyptian government to enable Internet connectivity in 500 busses next year: http://bit.ly/1acUhdP
name: Egyptian government to enable Internet connectivity in 500 busses next year
caption: arabcrunch.com
description: The Egyptian government plans to get 500 busses internet connectivity via WIFI in 2014. Minister of telecommunications of Egypt Afit Helmi has said that the government is negotiating with a number ...
